column2: b'$DAIO certainly looks like it has an interesting hold in an important area. Microcontrollers run the world. https://t.co/S4t2Mozg2h'

b'2) We believe $DAIO is a great play on the increasing electronic content in cars\xe2\x80\x94particularly hybrids & EVs, as referenced here: https://t.co/3afBL87jwQ  An EV of 2x $30 million in normalized (post-COVID) annual revenue would put the stock at around $8.70/sh.'
b'1) We own a little company with the ticker $DAIO. For Q3 it reported great sequential and year-over-year growth with a 55% gross margin, $13M in cash and no debt: https://t.co/BPnttKZ5Px'
